httpResponseTemplate.template: return {'statusCode': 200, 'headers': {'Date': [Date()]}, 'body': {method: request.method, path: request.path, body: request.body}};
return {'statusCode': 200, 'headers': {'Date': [Date()]}, 'body': {method: request.method, path: request.path, body: request.body, userid: request.queryStringParameters['userid'] }};
